properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is a table Where my Lord is waiting A Precious table Where He waits for me He bids me enter Into sweet communion And to remember His love for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord I remember How You left your glory Came into my story Bled and died for me Now I proclaim Lord You bore all my sin and shame Lord Gave to me Your name Lord You rescued me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You know my frailties And yet, how You love me You know my weakness Yet, Your love is strong Youâ€™re my provision For my every longing Because I love You I sing this song.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord I remember How You left your glory Came into my story Bled and died for me Now I proclaim Lord You bore all my sin and shame Lord Gave to me Your name Lord You rescued me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We share Your table; We are here together. We eat and drink now, All in unity We come, we meet You, And share sweet communion And we proclaim here Your love so free{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord we remember How You left Your glory Came into our story Died to set us free Now we proclaim Lord You bore all our sin and shame Lord Gave to us Your name Lord You rescued me.{/lang-eng}
